name: Government College of Engineering & Technology (GCET)
description: GCET Jammu is a premier government engineering college in J&K, offering undergraduate programs in various engineering disciplines with strong placement support.
admission_process: Admissions are based on JKCET and national-level entrance exams (JEE Mains). Reservation quotas are applicable as per government rules.
scholarships_info: Scholarships available for economically weaker students, SC/ST, OBC, and merit-based candidates.

name: National Institute of Technology (NIT) Srinagar
description: NIT Srinagar is an Institute of National Importance offering B.Tech, M.Tech, and PhD programs. Known for research and strong alumni network.
admission_process: Admissions through JEE Main followed by JoSAA counselling for B.Tech programs. M.Tech through GATE.
scholarships_info: Central and state-level scholarships are available for students from economically weaker sections and reserved categories.

name: Government Medical College (GMC) Srinagar
description: One of the oldest and most reputed medical institutions in J&K offering MBBS, MD, MS, and allied health sciences.
admission_process: Admissions are conducted through NEET-UG and NEET-PG counseling.
scholarships_info: Special financial assistance for students from poor backgrounds and reserved categories.

name: Sher-e-Kashmir University of Agricultural Sciences & Technology (SKUAST)
description: SKUAST is a leading institution in agricultural education and research serving farmers and students across J&K.
admission_process: Entrance exams conducted by SKUAST for UG and PG courses. Some seats reserved for J&K residents.
scholarships_info: Scholarships for rural students, children of farmers, and economically weaker backgrounds.

name: Islamia College of Science & Commerce
description: A leading autonomous government college affiliated with Cluster University Srinagar, offering UG and PG programs in sciences and commerce.
admission_process: Admissions based on merit and entrance tests conducted by Cluster University.
scholarships_info: Financial support for needy students through state and central government schemes.
